com.captcha.botdetect.internal.core
Class CaptchaBase

java.lang.Object
  com.captcha.botdetect.internal.core.CaptchaBase
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class CaptchaBase
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

A base Captcha object, representing a generic Captcha instance capable of generating Captcha codes, images and sounds + validating user inputs.

See Also:

validate

public boolean validate(java.lang.String userInput,
                        java.lang.String instanceId,
                        ValidationAttemptOrigin origin,
                        boolean isLocalNetwork)
Returns:
Compares the user input to the Captcha code stored for the given instanceId, using validation rules specified for the current ValidationAttemptOrigin
